src:
広島の長野、ＦＡ権行使せず残留

01 Nov 2019

　広島の長野久義外野手（３４）が１日、マツダスタジアムで取材に応じ、海外フリーエージェント（ＦＡ）権を行使せず残留することを表明した。「（契約の）提示を受けた。（来季も広島でやりたい思いは）もちろん」と話した。鈴木清明球団本部長は「引き続きうちでやってくれる意思を持ってくれて、楽しみが増えた」と語った。
　長野は福岡・筑陽学園高から日大、社会人のホンダを経てドラフト１位で巨人入りした２０１０年に新人王に輝き、１１年に首位打者、１２年には最多安打のタイトルを獲得。巨人に移籍した丸佳浩外野手の人的補償で広島に加入した今季はプロ１０年目で最少の出場７２試合だった。
text:
Nagano in Hiroshima remains without exercising FA rights

01 Nov 2019

”Hiroyoshi Nagano, an outfielder (34) from Hiroshima, told Mazda Stadium on the 1st that he would remain without exercising overseas free agent (FA) rights. “I received a (contract) presentation (I would like to do it in Hiroshima next season), of course.” “The enthusiasm for us to continue doing so has increased my pleasure,” said Kiyoaki Suzuki.
Nagano became a rookie king in 2010 when he entered the first place in the draft after working for Honda from the Chikugakuen High School in Fukuoka and Chikuyo Gakuen. This season, when he joined Hiroshima due to the human compensation of the outfielder who transferred to the giant, this season was the least 72 matches in his 10th year.
